name: The Defenders (itch)
description:
A simple top-down arena style fighting game.

Woah, that was really boring. I'll describe it more below.

Battle with your mouse and keyboard or a controller against waves of Zombies and stationary Sentries.

Your arsenal is simple. Your only defense is a sword and a bow.

This game wont be finished for a while. There is a lot to do, but there will be beta releases.

— CONTROLS —

Sword Attack: Left Mouse Button or Right Bumper

Bow Attack: Right Mouse Button or Right Trigger

Look: Mouse Direction or Right Joystick

Walk: Z Key or Left Trigger

Menu Up: Up Arrow Key or D-Pad Up

Menu Down: Down Arrow Key or D-Pad Down

Menu Select: Z Key or A Button (xbox controller)/X Button (playstation controller)

— TOOLS USED —

Links to all of these tools will be provided. I am not sponsored or supported in any way by these companies or designers.

- SFXR (sound effects)

- GameMaker Studio 2 (programming engine and language)
